text: Allahâ€Œi tini yini mahakasamandalake urdhbe sthapana karechena kono stambha chara -- tomara to e dekhacha, ara tini arase samasina halena, ara tini surya o candrake anugata karalena. Pratyeke abartana karache ekati nirdista kaksapathe. Tini'i byapara niyantrana karena, bisadabhabe barnana karena nirdesabali, yena tomara tomadera prabhura sange saksatkara sanbandhe niscita bisbasa karate para.
